languages.text: "Мне говорили, что предыдущий Наместник в аналогичной ситуации приказал отцепить целый астероид и сбросить на звезду".
"I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."
languages.original_text: "Мне говорили, что предыдущий Наместник в аналогичной ситуации приказал отцепить целый астероид и сбросить на звезду".

traits.locale_text: "I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered to have an entire asteroid detached and dropped into the star."
"I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered to have an entire asteroid detached and dropped into the star."
"I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."
"I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."
"I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."

languages.text: 「前領主も同様の状況に直面したとき、小惑星そのものを切り離して惑星に落とすよう命令したと聞いた」
languages.original_text: "I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."

traits.locale_text: 「前領主も同様の状況に直面したとき、小惑星そのものを切り離して惑星に落とすよう命令したと聞いた」

languages.text: “有人告诉我，说上一任总督在面临类似的情况时，下令将整个小行星分离出去，丢到恒星里。”
languages.original_text: "I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."

traits.locale_text: “有人告诉我，说上一任总督在面临类似的情况时，下令将整个小行星分离出去，丢到恒星里。”

languages.text: «Ha llegado a mis oídos que, cuando el Señor anterior se enfrentó a una situación parecida, ordenó que se desanclara el asteroide entero y que cayera a la estrella».
languages.original_text: "I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."

traits.locale_text: «Ha llegado a mis oídos que, cuando el Señor anterior se enfrentó a una situación parecida, ordenó que se desanclara el asteroide entero y que cayera a la estrella».

languages.text: « On m'a dit que dans une situation similaire, le précédent suzerain avait ordonné que l'on détache l'astéroïde et qu'on le largue dans l'étoile. »
languages.original_text: "I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."

traits.locale_text: « On m'a dit que dans une situation similaire, le précédent suzerain avait ordonné que l'on détache l'astéroïde et qu'on le largue dans l'étoile. »

languages.text: "Ich habe gehört, als der vorherige Lehnsherr vor einem ähnlichen Problem stand, ließ er den gesamten Asteroiden abtrennen und in den Stern stürzen."
languages.original_text: "I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gehört, als der vorherige Lehnsherr vor einem ähnlichen Problem stand, ließ er den gesamten Asteroiden abtrennen und in den Stern stürzen."

languages.text: "Önceki Emîr'in benzer bir durumla karşı karşıya kaldığında tüm asteroidin koparılıp yıldıza bırakılmasını emrettiği söylendi bana."
languages.original_text: "I've been told that, when the previous Liege was faced with a similar situation, he ordered that the entire asteroid be detached and dropped into the star."

traits.locale_text: "Önceki Emîr'in benzer bir durumla karşı karşıya kaldığında, tüm asteroidin koparılıp yıldıza bırakılmasını emrettiği söylendi bana."
